title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Direct Volunteer Support - Administrative

description.narrative: Support costs incurred for direct support of volunteers in Sri Lanka, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Overseas Program Support - Administrative

description.narrative: Overseas program support costs in Sri Lanka. Includes overseas staff salaries and benefit costs, leases, staff travel, communications, conferences, supplies, equipment and International Cooperative Administrative Support Services (ICASS). Excludes costs for training, medical and security.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Medical Support - Administrative

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Sri Lanka. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Pre-Service Training - Administrative

description.narrative: All costs incurred for pre-Service training of volunteers in Sri Lanka including pre-service training in the U.S., pre-departure staging costs, and pre-service training overseas.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Safety and Security - Administrative

description.narrative: Volunteer safety and security costs in Sri Lanka directly associated with Volunteer and staff safety (preparedness and training), and the physical security of Peace Corps-leased properties. Includes guard services, security staff, security-related travel, supplies, equipment, physical property upgrades, and the Office of Safety and Security.
